mapper.insert: insert into PaymentResponse(id, acknowledgedAmount, rawResponse, transactionID, referenceID, status, createTime, lastUpdateTime, externalTransactionID, paymentMethod, customerID, operationType, business) values (#{id}, #{acknowledgedAmount}, #{rawResponse}, #{transactionID}, #{referenceID}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{externalTransactionID}, #{paymentMethod}, #{customerID}, #{operationType}, #{business})
mapper.update: update PaymentResponse set status = #{status}, lastUpdateTime = #{lastUpdateTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from PaymentResponse where referenceID = #{arg0} and business = #{arg1}
select * from PaymentResponse where customerID = #{arg0} and operationType = #{arg1}
select * from PaymentResponse where createTime >= #{arg0} and createTime <= #{arg1}
